mapper.select:
SELECT T.BATCH_DIV ,T1.DATA_DIV ,T1.COMET_SEQ ,T1.TOTAL_WEIGHT ,T1.TOTAL_QTY ,T1.SO_AMOUNT ,T1.SUBTOTAL_SO_AMOUNT ,T1.TAX_AMOUNT ,T1.TENTHS_DISCOUNTED_COST ,T1.TOTAL_AMOUNT_PRICE ,T1.DELI_NOTE_NO_MJP ,T1.TOTAL_S_AMOUNT_MJP ,T1.W1_DELI_ATTENTION_CD ,T1.BOX_NUMBER_SEQ ,T1.SHIPPING_NUMBER ,T1.DELI_DEPT_CD ,T1.DELI_NOTE_NO ,T1.CHILD_SEQ AS CHILD_SEQ_KEY ,T1.SO_DATE AS SO_DATE_KEY ,T1.MC_PLANT_CD ,T1.GLOBAL_NO ,M13.NTV_MC_PLANT_NAME ,M1.CLASSIFY_CD ,M3.BRAND_NAME ,M3.NTV_BRAND_NAME ,M3.BRAND_NAME_FOR_PRODUCT_CD ,M11.SHIPPING_CARRIER_NAME ,M11.SHIPPING_CARRIER_ABB ,M9.NTV_SUBSIDIARY_NAME ,M9.SUBSIDIARY_NAME ,M9.NTV_ADDRESS_1 AS SUBSIDIARY_NTV_ADDRESS_1 ,M9.ADDRESS_1 AS SUBSIDIARY_ADDRESS_1 ,M9.NTV_ADDRESS_2 AS SUBSIDIARY_NTV_ADDRESS_2 ,M9.ADDRESS_2 AS SUBSIDIARY_ADDRESS_2 ,M9.NTV_ADDRESS_3 AS SUBSIDIARY_NTV_ADDRESS_3 ,M9.ADDRESS_3 AS SUBSIDIARY_ADDRESS_3 ,M9.NTV_ADDRESS_4 AS SUBSIDIARY_NTV_ADDRESS_4 ,M9.ADDRESS_4 AS SUBSIDIARY_ADDRESS_4 ,M9.TEL AS SUBSIDIARY_TEL ,M9.FAX AS SUBSIDIARY_FAX ,M9.POSTAL_CD AS SUBSIDIARY_POSTAL_CD ,M9.COUNTRY_CD AS SUBSIDIARY_COUNTRY_CD ,M9.LICENCE_NO AS SUBSIDIARY_LICENCE_NO ,M9.VAT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER AS SUBSIDIARY_VAT_REGISTRATION_NUMBER ,M21.COUNTRY_CD AS DEPT_COUNTRY_CD ,M6.COUNTRY_NAME AS PURC_COUNTRY_NAME ,M17.UPS_COUNTRY_CD AS CUST_UPS_COUNTRY_CD ,M17.NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 AS CUST_NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 ,M17.COUNTRY_NAME AS CUST_COUNTRY_NAME ,M20.NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 AS ORIGIN_NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 ,M20.COUNTRY_NAME AS ORIGIN_COUNTRY_NAME ,M18.UPS_COUNTRY_CD AS SHIP_TO_UPS_COUNTRY_CD ,M18.NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 ,M18.COUNTRY_NAME AS SHIP_TO_COUNTRY_NAME ,M19.NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 AS BILL_TO_NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 ,M19.COUNTRY_NAME AS BILL_TO_COUNTRY_NAME ,M4.NTV1_COMPANY_NAME ,M4.COMPANY_NAME ,M4.COUNTRY_CD AS PURC_COUNTRY_CD ,M4.NTV2_COMPANY_NAME ,M12.CUST_SHIPMODE ,T3.HEADER_REF ,T3.ENG_HEADER_REF ,T3.CARRIER_ACCT_NO ,T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD ,T2.MC_CD ,T2.CUST_CD ,T2.CUSTSUB_SUBSIDIARY_CD ,T2.SUPPLIER_CD ,T2.MC_PLANT_DIV ,T2.SHIP_TO_CD ,T2.VRD ,T2.VSD ,T2.Y_PART_NO_DIV ,T2.CUST_REF_LENGTH ,T2.CUST_REF ,T2.CUST_SUB_REF ,T2.PRODUCT_CD ,T2.INNER_CD ,T2.PRODUCT_ASSORT ,T2.SO_QTY ,T2.PURCHASE_UNIT_PRICE ,T2.EXCLUDE_TAX_S_U_PRICE ,T2.DELI_DIV ,T2.PACKING_RANK ,T2.SPECIFY_VOUCHER_DIV ,T2.MOVE_TICKET_DIV ,T2.DELI_ATTENTION_CD ,T2.NTV_DELI_DEPT ,T2.GRP ,T2.NTV_DELI_ATTENTION ,T2.BRAND_CD ,T2.NTV_CUST_DEPT ,T2.NTV_CUST_ATTENTION ,T2.CUSTSUB_MC_PLANT_CD ,T2.PAYMENT_TERMS ,T2.INCOTERMS ,T2.SETTLEMENT_METHOD ,T2.VOUCHER_DIV ,T2.CUSTSUB_CUST_CD ,T2.CUSTSUB_SHIP_TO_CD ,T2.CUST_CATEGORY_CD ,T2.SO_VOUCHER_NO ,T2.SO_DATE ,T2.WEIGHT ,T2.WEIGHT_UNIT ,T2.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN ,T2.S_UNIT_PRICE_CCY_CD ,T2.P_UNIT_PRICE_CCY_CD ,T2.INCLUDE_TAX_S_U_PRICE ,T2.OTHER_DSCT_AMOUNT ,T2.CRD ,T2.TRANSPORT_MEANS ,T2.HAZARD_FLG ,T2.DIRECT_SHIP_FLG ,T2.AUTOMOBILE_STANDARD_CD ,T2.STORK_CHARGE_APPLY_DIV ,T2.ORIGINAL_DELI_NOTE_NO ,T2.CUST_COUNTRY_CD ,T2.SHIP_TO_COUNTRY_CD ,T2.STOCK_DIV ,M5.PRODUCT_CD AS PRODUCT_CD_MST ,M5.PO_QTY_PER_CASE ,M5.HS_CD ,M5.NTV_PRODUCT_NAME ,M5.PRODUCT_NAME ,M5.PRODUCT_CONTROL_DEP_CODE ,M5.UNIT_OF_MEASURE ,M2.NTV_CLASSIFY_CD_NAME ,M2.CLASSIFY_CD_NAME ,M10.TEMP_VOUCHER_DIV ,M10.FRT_AREA_CD AS SHIP_TO_FRT_AREA_CD ,M10.BUSINESSINSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG AS SHIP_TO_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG ,M10.NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1 ,M10.BUSINESSINSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG AS SHIP_TO_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG ,M10.NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2 ,M10.PACKING_INSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG AS SHIP_TO_PACKING_INSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG ,M10.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1 ,M10.PACKING_INSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG AS SHIP_TO_PACKING_INSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG ,M10.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2 ,M10.NTV_SHIP_TO_NAME1 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_SHIP_TO_NAME1 ,M10.SHIP_TO_NAME ,M10.NTV_ADDRESS_1 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_1 ,M10.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 AS SHIP_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 ,M10.NTV_ADDRESS_2 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_2 ,M10.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 AS SHIP_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 ,M10.NTV_ADDRESS_3 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_3 ,M10.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 AS SHIP_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 ,M10.NTV_ADDRESS_4 AS SHIP_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_4 ,M10.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 AS SHIP_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 ,M10.POSTAL_CD AS SHIP_TO_POSTAL_CD ,M10.COUNTRY_CD AS SHIP_TO_COUNTRY_CD_MST ,M10.CITY_NAME AS SHIP_TO_CITY_NAME ,M10.TEL AS SHIP_TO_TEL ,M10.FAX AS SHIP_TO_FAX ,M10.MAIL_ADDRESS AS SHIP_TO_MAIL_ADDRESS ,M10.DELI_ATTENTION AS SHIP_TO_DELI_ATTENTION ,M10.DELI_DEPT AS SHIP_TO_DELI_DEPT ,M10.NTV_SHIP_TO_NAME2 ,M10.CITY_CD AS SHIP_TO_CITY_CD ,M27.NTV_SHIP_TO_NAME1 AS SUBSIDIARY_NTV_SHIP_TO_NAME1 ,M27.SHIP_TO_NAME AS SUBSIDIARY_SHIP_TO_NAME ,M7.MC_SPECIFY_VOUCHER_DIV ,M7.DELI_NOTE_SEND_FLG ,M7.FRT_AREA_CD AS CUST_FRT_AREA_CD ,M7.COM_INV_FLG ,M7.COM_INV_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.COM_INV_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.COM_INV_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.DELI_ORDER_FLG ,M7.DELI_ORDER_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.DELI_ORDER_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.DELI_ORDER_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.PACK_LIST_FLG ,M7.PACK_LIST_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.PACK_LIST_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.PACK_LIST_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.INV_PACK_FLG ,M7.INV_PACK_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.INV_PACK_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.INV_PACK_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.ECAL_CUST_CD ,M7.NTV_CUST_NAME1 ,M7.CUST_NAME ,M7.NTV_ADDRESS_1 AS CUST_NTV_ADDRESS_1 ,M7.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 AS CUST_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 ,M7.NTV_ADDRESS_2 AS CUST_NTV_ADDRESS_2 ,M7.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 AS CUST_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 ,M7.NTV_ADDRESS_3 AS CUST_NTV_ADDRESS_3 ,M7.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 AS CUST_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 ,M7.NTV_ADDRESS_4 AS CUST_NTV_ADDRESS_4 ,M7.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 AS CUST_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 ,M7.COUNTRY_CD AS CUST_COUNTRY_CD_MST ,M7.CITY_NAME AS CUST_CITY_NAME ,M7.CITY_CD AS CUST_CITY_CD ,M7.TEL AS CUST_TEL ,M7.FAX AS CUST_FAX ,M7.BUSINESSINSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG AS CUST_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1 AS CUST_NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT1 ,M7.BUSINESSINSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG AS CUST_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2 AS CUST_NTV_BUSINESSINSTRUCT2 ,M7.PACKING_INSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG AS CUST_PACKING_INSTRUCT1_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1 AS CUST_NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1 ,M7.PACKING_INSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG AS CUST_PACKING_INSTRUCT2_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2 AS CUST_NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2 ,M7.CUST_OFFICE_LICENSE_NO AS CUST_CUST_OFFICE_LICENSE_NO ,M7.BILL_TO_CD AS CUST_BILL_TO_CD ,M7.PRODUCT_GENERIC_NAME_FLG ,M7.TAX_AREA_CD ,M7.TAX_FREE_FLG ,M7.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGN_SHOW_FLG ,M7.FRT_DISCOUNT_FLG ,M7.SPECIAL_CUST_BOX_NO ,M7.SPECIAL_CUST_BOX_GRP ,M7.DISCOUNT_SHOW_FLG ,M7.HS_CD_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NET_WEIGHT_SHOW_FLG ,M7.NTV_CUST_NAME2 ,M7.CELL_CD ,M7.MAIL_ADDRESS AS CUST_MAIL_ADDRESS ,M7.PACKING_FLG ,M7.PACKING_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.PACKING_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.PACKING_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.ENG_PACKING_FLG ,M7.ENG_PACKING_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.ENG_PACKING_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.ENG_PACKING_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.TMP_PACKING_FLG ,M7.TMP_PACKING_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.TMP_PACKING_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.TMP_PACKING_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.INVOICE_FLG ,M7.INVOICE_PRINT_NUM_ORGN ,M7.INVOICE_PRINT_NUM_COPY ,M7.INVOICE_RETAIN_FLG ,M7.POSTAL_CD ,M22.NTV_CUST_NAME1 AS CUSTOMER_NTV_CUST_NAME1 ,M22.CUST_NAME AS CUSTOMER_CUST_NAME ,M26.CUST_NAME AS CUST_MJP_CUST_NAME ,M16.LABEL_EARLY_DIV ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT1_J, M30.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT1_J) AS NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT1_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT2_J, M30.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT2_J) AS NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT2_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT3_J, M30.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT3_J) AS NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT3_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT4_J, M30.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT4_J) AS NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT4_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT5_J, M30.NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT5_J) AS NTV_BUSINESS_INSTRUCT5_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1_J, M30.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1_J) AS NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT1_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2_J, M30.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2_J) AS NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT2_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT3_J, M30.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT3_J) AS NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT3_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT4_J, M30.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT4_J) AS NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT4_J ,IF(M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD IS NOT NULL, M16.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT5_J, M30.NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT5_J) AS NTV_PACKING_INSTRUCT5_J ,M8.NTV_BILL_TO_NAME ,M8.BILL_TO_NAME ,M8.NTV_ADDRESS_1 AS BILL_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_1 ,M8.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 AS BILL_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_1 ,M8.NTV_ADDRESS_2 AS BILL_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_2 ,M8.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 AS BILL_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_2 ,M8.NTV_ADDRESS_3 AS BILL_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_3 ,M8.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 AS BILL_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_3 ,M8.NTV_ADDRESS_4 AS BILL_TO_NTV_ADDRESS_4 ,M8.HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 AS BILL_TO_HALFWIDTH_ADDRESS_4 ,M8.NTV_BILL_TO_DEPT AS BILL_TO_NTV_BILL_TO_DEPT ,M8.POSTAL_CD AS BILL_TO_POSTAL_CD ,M8.COUNTRY_CD AS BILL_TO_COUNTRY_CD ,M8.TEL AS BILL_TO_TEL ,M8.FAX_BILL_TO ,M8.NTV_BILL_TO_PERSON ,M8.NTV_RECEIVABLE_REMARKS_1 ,M8.NTV_RECEIVABLE_REMARKS_2 ,M8.UNIFORM_INV_TYPE ,M8.AR_CLOSE_UNIT ,M8.AR_CLOSING_DAY ,M8.SERVICE_STOP_DIV ,M8.TAX_IN_EX_DIV ,M8.RECEIVABLE_MC_CD ,T5.BARCODE_GLOBAL_NO ,T5.SUPPLIER_INV_NO ,CONCAT(IFNULL(T4.CHILD_SEQ, "")) AS CHILD_SEQ ,T4.GLOBAL_NO_PO ,T4.DEL_FLG ,T4.SUBSIDIARY_CD AS SO_SUBSIDIARY_CD ,M14.DEPT_NAME AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_DEPT_NAME ,M14.ADDRESS_1 AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_ADDRESS_1 ,M14.ADDRESS_2 AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_ADDRESS_2 ,M14.ADDRESS_3 AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_ADDRESS_3 ,M14.ADDRESS_4 AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_ADDRESS_4 ,M14.POSTAL_CD AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_POSTAL_CD ,M14.TEL AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_TEL ,M14.FAX AS SUBSIDIARY_PLANT_FAX ,M24.NTV_DEPT_NAME_ABB ,M24.TEL AS PLANT_DEPT_TEL ,M15.ORDER_MSG_CD ,T8.SUBSIDIARY_CD AS SUBSIDIARY_CD_ARR_DT ,T7.HD_COMMENT_FOR_LOGISTICS ,T6.DT_COMMENT ,M25.NTV_CELL_NAME ,M25.CELL_NAME ,M28.NTV_COUNTRY_NAME_1 ,M28.COUNTRY_NAME ,M29.SUBSIDIARY_SYS_DIV FROM
T_ONDEMAND_SHIPMENT_MNG T
INNER JOIN T_ONDEMAND_SHIPMENT T1 ON T.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T1.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T.MC_PLANT_CD = T1.MC_PLANT_CD AND T1.MAGI_EXTRACT_TARGET_FLG = "1" AND T1.DEL_FLG = "0" AND T1.STATUS_CD IN ("0000", "0001", "0002")
INNER JOIN T_SO_DETAIL_HISTORY T2 ON T1.SO_DETAIL_HISTORY_ID = T2.SO_DETAIL_HISTORY_ID AND T2.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN T_SO_HEADER T3 ON T2.ACE_KEY_NO = T3.ACE_KEY_NO AND T3.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN T_SO_SET_ITEM_DETAIL T4 ON T1.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T4.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T1.GLOBAL_NO = T4.PARENT_GLOBAL_NUMBER AND T1.CHILD_SEQ = T4.CHILD_SEQ AND T4.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN T_PURCHASE_ORDER T5 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T5.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.GLOBAL_NO = T5.GLOBAL_NO AND T5.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN SO_DETAIL_TBL T6 ON T1.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T6.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T1.GLOBAL_NO = T6.GLOBAL_NO AND T1.SO_VOUCHER_NO = T6.SO_NO
LEFT JOIN SO_HEADER_TBL T7 ON T6.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T7.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T6.SO_NO = T7.SO_NO
LEFT JOIN T_ARRIVAL_DATE_DESIGNATE T8 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = T8.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.MC_CD = T8.MC_CD AND T2.CUST_CD = T8.CUST_CD AND T2.SHIP_TO_CD = T8.SHIP_TO_CD AND T2.GLOBAL_NO = T8.GLOBAL_NUMBER_SEQ AND T2.VSD = T8.VSD AND T8.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_TYPE_CODE M1 ON left(T2.INNER_CD,7) = M1.TYPE_CD AND M1.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_PRODUCT_CLASSIFY M2 ON M1.CLASSIFY_CD = M2.CLASSIFY_CD AND M2.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_BRAND M3 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M3.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.BRAND_CD = M3.BRAND_CD AND M3.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SUPPLIER M4 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M4.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.SUPPLIER_CD = M4.SUPPLIER_CD AND M4.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_PRODUCT M5 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M5.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.INNER_CD = M5.INNER_CD AND M5.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M6 ON M4.COUNTRY_CD = M6.COUNTRY_CD AND M6.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER M7 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M7.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.CUST_CD = M7.CUST_CD AND M7.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_BILL_TO M8 ON M7.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M8.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M7.BILL_TO_CD = M8.BILL_TO_CD AND M8.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SUBSIDIARY M9 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M9.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M9.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SHIP_TO M10 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M10.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.CUST_CD = M10.CUST_CD AND T2.SHIP_TO_CD = M10.SHIP_TO_CD AND M10.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_FINAL_SHIPMODE_MANAGE M12 ON M10.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M12.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M10.SHIPPING_DESTINATION_CD = M12.SHIPPING_DESTINATION_CD AND T1.MC_PLANT_CD = M12.MC_PLANT_CD AND M12.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER_SHIPMODE M11 ON M12.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M11.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M12.CUST_SHIPMODE = M11.CUST_SHIPMODE AND M11.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_MC_PLANT M13 ON T2.CUSTSUB_MC_PLANT_CD = M13.MC_PLANT_CD AND M13.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_DEPARTMENT M14 ON M13.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M14.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M13.DEPT_CD = M14.DEPT_CD AND M14.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_EXPORT_MANAGE M15 ON M15.SUBSIDIARY_CD_FROM = 'MJP' AND T2.INNER_CD = M15.INNER_CD_FROM AND T2.CUSTSUB_SUBSIDIARY_CD = M15.SUBSIDIARY_CD_TO AND M15.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUST_SHIP_TO_LOGI M16 ON M10.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M16.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M10.CUST_CD = M16.CUST_CD AND M10.SHIP_TO_CD = M16.SHIP_TO_CD AND M16.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M17 ON M7.COUNTRY_CD = M17.COUNTRY_CD AND M17.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M18 ON M10.COUNTRY_CD = M18.COUNTRY_CD AND M18.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M19 ON M8.COUNTRY_CD = M19.COUNTRY_CD AND M19.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M20 ON T2.COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN = M20.COUNTRY_CD AND M20.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SUBSIDIARY M21 ON M14.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M21.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M21.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER M22 ON T2.CUSTSUB_CUST_CD = M22.CUST_CD AND T2.CUSTSUB_SUBSIDIARY_CD = M22.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M22.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_MC_PLANT M23 ON T2.MC_CD = M23.MC_PLANT_CD AND M23.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_DEPARTMENT M24 ON M23.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M24.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M23.DEPT_CD = M24.DEPT_CD AND M24.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CELL M25 ON T1.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M25.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M7.CELL_CD = M25.CELL_CD AND M25.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER M26 ON M26.SUBSIDIARY_CD = 'MJP' AND T2.CUSTSUB_CUST_CD = M26.CUST_CD AND M26.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SHIP_TO M27 ON T2.CUSTSUB_SUBSIDIARY_CD = M27.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.CUSTSUB_CUST_CD = M27.CUST_CD AND T2.CUSTSUB_SHIP_TO_CD = M27.SHIP_TO_CD AND M27.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_COUNTRY M28 ON M9.COUNTRY_CD = M28.COUNTRY_CD AND M28.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_SUBSIDIARY M29 ON T2.CUSTSUB_SUBSIDIARY_CD = M29.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND M29.DEL_FLG = "0"
LEFT JOIN M_CUST_SHIP_TO_LOGI M30 ON T2.SUBSIDIARY_CD = M30.SUBSIDIARY_CD AND T2.CUST_CD = M30.CUST_CD AND M30.SHIP_TO_CD = "" AND M30.DEL_FLG = "0" WHERE T.OD_SHIP_MNG_STATUS_CD = "0005" ORDER BY T1.GLOBAL_NO, T1.CHILD_SEQ, T1.SO_DETAIL_HISTORY_ID ASC LIMIT #{_skiprows}, #{_pagesize}
